entry.title: Halloween 3-Pack Monster Cereals
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: Snacks
Price: 24.99

Retro American Cereal

Breakfast of Sweeties

Introduced in Halloween in 1971, this mix of cereal and marshmallows has a distinct chocolate flavour and is only produced by General Mills during the halloween season. Pick yours up today before they run off scared!

entry.title: Mike and Ike Sour Lemon - 24ct
entry.summary:
Vendor: Just Born
Type: Candy
Price: 11.99

 Sour Citrusy Mike and Ike's for On-The-Go

    So you forgot your lemon ginger shot at home and now you're looking for some way to get your tangy, citrus fix? Try this sweet and sour alternative, Mike and Ike's Sour Lemon! Each pack contains a burst of fruity Lemon flavoured Mike and Ike's that'll leave your tastebuds stunned. 
    This box comes with 24 mini-packs that are perfect to take with you wherever you go. Whether you down the pack in one gulp, or share with your friends, we'll support you any way you want to enjoy your candy. 

Perfect for keeping your favourite treat in stock, for lunch boxes, or on-the-go snacks!

  • Made in the USA
  • Kosher Certified Parve
  • Gluten-Free
  • Fat-Free
  • Made with Real Fruit Juice

528g | 24 packs in one box

entry.title: Fruity Pebbles Marshmallow Cereal
entry.summary:
Vendor: Post
Type: Snacks
Price: 12.49

NEW from Post!

Fruity Pebbles with Marshmallows

Special Edition ✩ American Cereal

Post's Fruity Pebbles with Marshmallows will make Monday mornings worth waking up for! Your favourite breakfast cereal is made of sweetened rice and the delicious addition of colourful marshmallows provides a tasty twist on the original Fruity Pebbles.

If you love Fruity Pebbles cereal & Lucky Charms marshmallows, you will truly appreciate everything about this delicious cereal!

Don't miss out on this special edition of Fruity Pebbles. Order while supplies last!

1 box - 311g

Click here for more cereal varieties!

Specialty Snacks Shipped to Canada & the USA!

Ingredients

Rice, Sugar, Marshmallows (Sugar, Modified Cornstarch, Corn Syrup, Dextrose, Gelatin, Sodium Hexametaphosphate, Yellow 5, Red 40, Blue 1, Yellow 6, Artificial Flavor), Corn Syrup, Canola Oil, Salt, Contains 1% or Less of: Natural and Artificial Flavor, Yellow 5, Yellow 6, Red 40, Blue 1, BHT Added to Preserve Freshness. Vitamins and Minerals: Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), Vitamin A Palmitate, Reduced Iron, Zinc Oxide, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride (Vitamin B6), Riboflavin (Vitamin B2), Thiamin Mononitrate (Vitamin B1), Vitamin D3, Folic Acid, Vitamin B12.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labeling or contact the manufacturer directly for current data. We cannot be held responsible for the accuracy of ingredients or nutritional information provided, nor liable for any reactions caused by the products we sell.

entry.title: Pop-Tarts Cinnamon Roll - 13.5oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kellogg's
Type: Snacks
Price: 7.99

Kellogg's Pop-Tarts Cinnamon Roll Toaster Pastries

Made for Fun!

The classic taste of a Cinnamon Roll is baked into Pop-Tarts for an amazing eating experience. A very sweet combination of frosting and Cinnamon Roll flavoured filling. Pop-Tarts Cinnamon are ready to eat right out of the box or enjoy them warmed up in the toaster or the microwave.

entry.title: Annabelle Giant Chewy Assortment - 35oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Annabelle Candy Co. Inc.
Type: Candy
Price: 33.99

Snack-Sized Blasts-to-the-Past!

     Give away a taste of nostalgia this Halloween with this deluxe pack of assorted Annabelle's retro candy bars! Whether you put these in your candy bowl to hand out or save at least some to snack on yourself (it's okay, we know everyone is a little guilty of this), these are some delicious treats that'll take you back.

     Unwrap an Abba-Zabba for a savoury taffy treat that you bite into to reveal the hidden, creamy peanut butter center. Tear open a Big Hunk for a peanut-packed, chewy, honey-sweetened nougat snack, or grab a Look! for that same yummy taste but then enveloped in rich dark chocolate. No matter what route you take, you're guaranteed a sweet ending!

     One bag comes with a boatload of sweet fun, clocking in at nearly a kilo of scrumptious, snack-sized goodies that you'll surely be tempted to keep all for yourself!

Trick-or-TREAT yo' self at Candy Funhouse!

35oz / 992g | 1 large bag

Spooky Scary Nerds

Calling all Nerds lovers! Get ready for a sweet thrill on Halloween. Candy Corn + Nerds = the perfect combination we all have been missing. Normally, we would say share a bag, or fill a bowl with these delightful sweets but...If you love nerds as much as us you definitely will not want to share this nerdy treat🤫

entry.summary:
Vendor: Espeez
Type: Candy
Price: 2.99

You'll Go Coco-Nuts For This Tasty Treat!

    This is a truly delectable goody for any fan of creamy coconut! These Neapolitan flavoured bars give you 3 delicious flavours in every bite; Chocolate, Vanilla, and Strawberry. The moist coconut will melt on your tongue, drowning your tastebuds in a tropical trance.

    An honest blast-to-the-past, these yummy bars have been around since 1894! A classic snack that surely will never be forgotten.

entry.title: Birthday Cake Pebbles Cereal - 10oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Post
Type: Snacks
Price: 11.99

Happy Birthday Pebbles!

There may not be a more iconic cereal! Fruity Pebbles have been putting smiles on kids faces since the 1970s and are now celebrating their 50th birthday! To this day they still feature the original Flinstones characters created by Hanna-Barbera, now owned by Warner Brothers. Enjoy them today in their new birthday cake flavour, a fun and delicious twist on the traditional birthday cake! The new cereal features blue, pink and yellow flakes and a vanilla birthday cake and frosting flavor. Have your cake and eat it too!

Limit 1 Per Customer

 

10oz

entry.title: Maltesers Celebration Size - 800g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mars Inc.
Type: Chocolate
Price: 18.74

Celebration Time C'mon!!

It's time to celebrate Maltesers

Maltesers are a classic Old Fashioned & Nostalgic Candy from the 1930's. A delicious malt honeycomb center covered covered with milk chocolate. A crunchy and light snack. Believe it or not, but this amazing candy had made it all over the world but only recently was introduced to the United States. In 2017 Maltesers finally began being sold all over America. The chocolate is still produced in Newmarket Ontario, but a large majority of that is now exported. Finally Americans are able to enjoy something we've been snacking on for over 50 years!

Maltesers are one of the Top 10 Canadian Candies.

 

800g
